name: Antorchas2016
description:
A game about reaching your home town with a torch.

During independence day in my country, you can see countless people running with torches. This is to symbolize the independence of my country.

why running and why torches?

They run to their home towns to announce that we are independent!

Arrows to Move and Z to jump

Made by Oscar Morales and Joel Espina

@Moraleszez
